question: What was the energy consumption trend throughout 2023?

options.A: Energy consumption increased gradually throughout the year.
options.B: Energy consumption decreased gradually from January to December.
options.C: Energy consumption was highest in January and lowest in December.
options.D: Energy consumption remained constant throughout the year.

explanation: The inverted Y-axis creates the false impression that energy consumption is decreasing when it is actually increasing. Consumption rose from 800 kWh in January to 1250 kWh in December.
